protocol.name: P-GSE15876-1
text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)

protocol.name: P-GSE15876-2
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown for 5 days before transfer to Dex media.  Roots were cut with a razor blade 0.5 mm below the root/hypocotyl junction and collected into RNA extraction buffer.

protocol.name: P-GSE15876-3
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized for 2 minutes in 70% ethanol, the ethanol was removed, then replaced with 30% Bleach and 0.02% Triton X-100 for 15 minutes. Seeds were rinsed 3 times with sterile water, stratified at 4ËšC for 2 days, then placed on standard media. Standard media is 1X Murashige and Skoog salt mixture, 1% sucrose, 1% agar and adjusted to pH 5.7 with KOH.  Dex media is 1X Murashige and Skoog salt mixture in which 1micromolar of Dex is added. Nylon mesh was placed on top of the solidified media and seeds were planted at ~20 seeds/cm in two rows.

protocol.name: P-GSE15876-4
protocol.text: Approximately 1000 roots were collected per replicate, with two biological replicates being performed per time point.  Samples were briefly sonicated to disrupt the tissue.  RNA was extracted using the RNAeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-GSE15876-5
protocol.text: Fragmented cRNA probes were prepared using the two-cycle amplification protocol by Affymetrix.

protocol.name: P-GSE15876-6
protocol.text: Samples were submitted to Duke Microarray Facility (Durham, NC) for hybridization to Affymetrix ATH1 microarrays.

protocol.name: P-GSE15876-7
protocol.text: Samples were submitted to Duke Microarray Facility (Durham, NC) for hybridization to Affymetrix ATH1 microarrays.
